entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Nipigon
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:28 PM EST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Clear. Low minus 31.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 31. Wind chill minus 28 this evening and minus 42 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 6:23 PM EST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Sunny. High minus 15.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light early in the afternoon. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 43 in the morning and minus 23 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 6:23 PM EST Monday 30 January 2023
